attributes.action: ask himself what is the greater threat: suicide bombers or global warming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I beg the Prime Minister to re-consider where lies the greater danger: from suicide bombers or from global warming - and plan accordingly. The balance of scientific opinion is that nature begins to turn against us and we have little time left. The answer from the City is the creation of markets trading "permits to pollute" between richer and poorer countries so that western governments look all right on paper. Even if we are not absolutely sure of the causes of global warming, we do need an insurance policy that will be rather more effective than this policy of re-arranging the deck-chairs on the Titanic, do we not?

rejection.details: The title must be a specific call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
